attributes.action: A no deal Brexit must be subject to a referendum majority.
attributes.background: A no deal Brexit will surely cause calamitous disruption to the UK and those who live there. Therefore it must be up to be people of the UK to ultimately decide if this is what they want. A public referendum is the only way to ensure this.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure which alternative/s to leaving the EU without a deal you want to include in a referendum.

There are already petitions calling for various types of referendum. You could sign one of these if it calls for something you'd like to happen. You're more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/246157

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/263134

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245516

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/272155

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
